statements: INSERT INTO quantum_computing_research (research_id, researcher_name, research_topic, publish_date) VALUES (1, 'Alice', 'Quantum Entanglement', '2022-01-10') ON CONFLICT (research_id) DO UPDATE SET researcher_name = 'Alice', research_topic = 'Quantum Entanglement', publish_date = '2022-01-10';

INSERT INTO quantum_computing_results (result_id, research_id, result_description, result_date) VALUES (1, 1, 'Successful experiment on Entanglement', '2022-02-15') ON CONFLICT (result_id) DO UPDATE SET research_id = 1, result_description = 'Successful experiment on Entanglement', result_date = '2022-02-15';

INSERT INTO quantum_computing_research (research_id, researcher_name, research_topic, publish_date) VALUES (2, 'Bob', 'Quantum Computing Algorithms', '2022-03-20') ON CONFLICT (research_id) DO UPDATE SET researcher_name = 'Bob', research_topic = 'Quantum Computing Algorithms', publish_date = '2022-03-20';
INSERT INTO qubits (id, state) VALUES (1, '0') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET state = EXCLUDED.state;
INSERT INTO entanglement (id, qubit_1, qubit_2) VALUES (1, 1, 2) ON CONFLICT (id) DO NOTHING;

INSERT INTO quantum_computers (id, model, qubit_count, manufacturer) VALUES (1, 'QuantumX', 50, 'Quantum Technologies') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET model = EXCLUDED.model, qubit_count = EXCLUDED.qubit_count, manufacturer = EXCLUDED.manufacturer;

INSERT INTO quantum_circuits (circuit_id, circuit_name, num_qubits) VALUES ('729b85f4-7b05-4a9f-b363-6729cf0d02d9', 'Quantum Circuit 1', 5) ON CONFLICT (circuit_id) DO UPDATE SET circuit_name=excluded.circuit_name, num_qubits=excluded.num_qubits;
UPSERT INTO quantum_gates (id, gate_name, gate_matrix) VALUES (1, 'Hadamard', '[0.707106781, 0.707106781; 0.707106781, -0.707106781]');
UPSERT INTO quantum_circuits (id, circuit_name, circuit_description) VALUES (1, 'Circuit1', 'Example circuit description');
